body_html:
Going to merge this PR now to unblock @zdevito and the robustness work being done by @jamesr66a and @wanchaol.

@apaszke I can address your comments about the tests in a followup PR (let me know if you would like me to change the tests to use tensors instead of scalars, or if we should consider allowing assigning tensors to ints, like in the common case you mentioned)
body_text:
Going to merge this PR now to unblock @zdevito and the robustness work being done by @jamesr66a and @wanchaol.
@apaszke I can address your comments about the tests in a followup PR (let me know if you would like me to change the tests to use tensors instead of scalars, or if we should consider allowing assigning tensors to ints, like in the common case you mentioned)
body:
Going to merge this PR now to unblock @zdevito and the robustness work being done by @jamesr66a and @wanchaol.

@apaszke I can address your comments about the tests in a followup PR (let me know if you would like me to change the tests to use tensors instead of scalars, or if we should consider allowing assigning tensors to ints, like in the common case you mentioned)
